values:
Welcome to Asset Island! Many aspiring game developers come here looking for lost and hidden game assets, to either fill their games or inspire new creations.

Search the island for lost assets with your metal detector, you should hear it beep and rumble as you approach and asset, and you can press the hint button to be guided in the direction of the nearest asset.

 You can leave once you’ve found them all or by quitting through the pause menu.
You’ve found all the assets! Thanks for playing!

You found a little space man, he doesn't seem suspicious at all.

He seems fully rigged and ready to go, so you could probably use him as a player character, or animate him for some other purposes.

Wow a Sea Shell, that would be a cool and logical thing to put in your tropical island environment. 

If you had a game set on and island and had this asset, it would probably be pretty lazy not to find some way to use it.
A Potion! A fantasy classic, you could do all kinds of things with this, healing, status effects, and fantastical home decor

A Bull Skull! It's kinda creepy and gross. 

You could probably get away with using it in a western themed game or a horror game depending how you wanna light it.

It's an Axe! great for fighting, cutting wood, and chopping things in general. 

You could probably recolor it to get several tiers of axe out of it, how economical of you.
It's a Gun. Should you be worried that you found random discarded gun? probably, but one persons possible tragedy is anothers game mechanic.
Bees. My God. Great for the environment, kinda annoying to deal with, would make for an ideal enemy or obsticle

A Soccer Ball. It's a ball for the sport of soccet, or football depending on where you live.

Obviously, you could use this to make a soccer game, but some with some creativity it could make an interesting prop or be used in some surprising way.
A Chainsaw, hell yea! it's a classic in action and horror games for a reason. Zombies, monsters, and trees beware!
The Iconic Red Barrel, you could probably do a lot of things with it... but you will probably just make it explode.
